additionalFeatures:
Zephyr Strike: 1st-level transmutation
Casting Time: 1 bonus action, once per short rest
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 min
   You move like the wind. For the duration, your movement doesnâ€™t 
   provoke opportunity attacks.
   Once before the spell ends, you can give yourself advantage on 
   one weapon attack roll on your turn. That attack deals an extra 
   1d8 force damage on a hit. Whether you hit or miss, your walking 
   speed increases by 30 feet until the end of that turn.
